ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Money troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: At your level, give willowisps a shot. they range from 9-11 You can sell lightstones to merchants for almost a plat, and greater lightstones for almost 4, or
ygData.messageBody:
At your level, give willowisps a shot. they range from 9-11
You can sell lightstones to merchants for almost a plat, and greater lightstones for almost 4, or you can sell to players for around 6pp. They give pretty good exp too, you should fly up pretty quick
best place for wisps off the top of my head are:
1) West commons, in the area between toll booth and druid ring
2) the isle in Erud's Crossing. Take the boat from Qeynos -> Erudin and there will be a stop halfway
3) Qeynos Hills, at the area right after you zone from qeynos up to the road

<LINKDEAD> [50 Enchanter] Fabno Licious (Erudite)
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Akane
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 11:17 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Money troubles

Sorry, forgot to mention that, didn't I? I'm on Fennin...
 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Danspath [mailto:danspth@...]
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 11:15 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Money troubles

At level 9? If you are on the Nameless server, I would
go to the East Commons and join the Orc group camps.
They often drop deathfist belts, which people will pay
4 to 5 plat for each one.

Zorel
31 SK
